name: Caterpillar
description: Heavy equipment manufacturer whose bulldozers are used in demolitions of Palestinian homes.
reasons: Supplies D9 armored bulldozers specially designed for the Israeli military used to demolish Palestinian homes and infrastructure
These militarized bulldozers have been documented in the destruction of over 50,000 Palestinian homes since 1967
Continues to provide equipment despite knowledge of how it's being used in violation of international humanitarian law
